title: Neuberggata 31, Majorstuen, Oslo. 5 floor Norway
about: Its located at the Neuberggata 31, Majorstuen, Oslo. 5 floor Norway , is an architectural gem standing tall in the heart of Lower Manhattan’s Financial District. Built in 2010, it offers stunning panoramic views of the bustling urban and unparalleled access to prime real estate in the area.

details.heading: Property Overview
items: Its located at the Neuberggata 31, Majorstuen, Oslo. 5 floor Norway , is an architectural gem standing tall in the heart of Lower Manhattan’s Financial District.
Built in 2010.
Stunning panoramic views and prime real estate access.

details.heading: Interior & Layout
items: 217 luxurious guest rooms with modern amenities.
11,118 sq ft of leasable retail space.
Total gross area of 143,281 square feet combining hospitality, retail, and event spaces.

details.heading: Furnishings & Appliances
items: Lobby bar/restaurant retail condominium unit for dining and entertainment.
Mezzanine level for events and dining with ample outdoor seating.
State-of-the-art facilities, including modern design and advanced infrastructure.

details.heading: Legal & Lease Info
items: Liberty Bond Enhancement offering sub-3% interest rates.
Matures in October 2042.

details.heading: Amenities
items: Luxury hotel environment.
Guest rooms, retail spaces, and dining areas.
Event-friendly infrastructure.
Architectural landmark with financial district prominence.

details.heading: Neighborhood & Utilities
items: Located in the Financial District.
Access to 1, R, W, 4, 5, A, C, E, J, Z subway lines and PATH system.

title: Very spacious 5-room penthouse in the middle of the city!
about: This is Section 10, H0401. Rent: €1,572.50 (kr 18,500) per month. Assessment: €807,500.00 (NOK 9,500,000). Rare penthouse apartment in the middle of Sandefjord city center. 5-room spacious layout with private roof terrace, parking, and elevator access.

details.heading: Property Overview
items: This is Section 10, H0401.
Rent: €1,572.50 (18,500 kr) per month.
Rare penthouse apartment in the middle of Sandefjord city center.
5-room spacious layout with private roof terrace, parking, and elevator access.
Centrally located within walking distance to shops, restaurants, cinema, and public transport.
Bus stop across the street. Short walk to train and bus stations.
Direct access to Torp Airport, Oslo, Tønsberg, and Larvik.

details.heading: Interior & Layout
items: Multi-level floor plan:
3rd floor: Entry and WC.
4th floor: 3 living rooms, 2 bedrooms, kitchen, 2 bathrooms, laundry.
5th floor: Tower-style loft room with wood-burning stove and 360-degree panoramic windows.
2 spacious bedrooms with storage and wardrobes.
2 bathrooms with WC, shower, and underfloor heating.
Separate laundry room included.

details.heading: Furnishings & Appliances
items: Rented unfurnished.
Integrated appliances: combination fridge, dishwasher, stove, hob.
Intercom available in building.
Non-smoking apartment.

details.heading: Legal & Lease Info
items: Binding period until 31.08.2025. 3-month notice required by either party.
Up to 1 month's rent due at contract signing.
Security deposit: 3 months' rent in separate tenant account.
Tenant manages own electricity subscription.
Rent includes water, sewage, and parking.
Case Number: 35359/0304-24.
Cadastral Info: Municipality no. 3804, Farm no. 172, Usage no. 162, Section no. 0.

title: Senior Housing Apartment in Sandefjord City Center with Elevator
about: This is a H0301 senior-friendly housing apartment located at Kongens gate 11, 3210 Sandefjord. Rent is €1,062.50 (kr. 12,500) per month, and the appraisal value is €374,000.00 (NOK 4,400,000). This centrally located unit offers easy access via elevator and includes common expenses. Available for long-term rental. Ideal for those seeking a calm, modern living experience with essential facilities in close proximity.

details.heading: Property Overview
items: Located in the heart of Sandefjord city center, Kongens gate 11.
Spacious senior housing apartment designed for comfort and accessibility.
Total primary area of 95 m² with a practical and airy layout.
Two spacious bedrooms and a calm atmosphere ideal for senior living.
Rental period starting from 01.04.2013 onward.
Common expenses are included in the rent.
Elevator ensures easy access to the 3rd floor.

details.heading: Interior & Layout
items: 95 m² layout with 2 bedrooms, bathroom, living room, and open-plan kitchen.
Parquet flooring and modern finishes throughout.
Bright living area with good natural light and pleasant views.

details.heading: Furnishings & Appliances
items: Partially furnished with essential fittings.
Modern kitchen fixtures and clean layout.
Alarm system, intercom, and janitor/guard service included.

details.heading: Legal & Lease Info
items: Lease start date: 01.04.2013.
Deposit: 3 months’ rent.
3-month notice required for termination by either party.
Rent includes common building expenses.
Digital lease contract creation available with verified details.
Cadastral Info: Kongens gate 11, 3210 Sandefjord.
Story: 3rd floor.

title: Attractive Commercial Unit in Sandefjord Pedestrian Street
about: This commercial property (Section 1) is located in the heart of Sandefjord at Kongens gate 11, one of the city’s busiest pedestrian streets. It offers 390 m² of usable open-plan retail or trade space with additional 170 m² of warehouse area in the basement. Annual rental income is approx. €3,825/month. Private parking is available behind the building, and the premises are immediately available. This is a rare opportunity to acquire a centrally located, high-visibility unit in a vibrant retail district.

details.heading: Premises Overview
items: Business section 1 – Business unit with ground floor retail space and basement storage.
Gross area: 427 m² (390 m² usable).
Basement: 170 m² (warehouse use).
Open-plan design located in Sandefjord’s central shopping area.
Located opposite Salt & Pepper and near Hvaltorvet shopping center.
Immediate proximity to public transport and city services.

details.heading: Facilities & Standard
items: Simple finish throughout; customizable to tenant needs.
Private parking available in backyard for employees or customers.
Access to both private and public parking options.
Electric heating system currently in place.

details.heading: Availability & Terms
items: Available for immediate occupancy.
Annual rent: €45,900 (kr. 540,000) (excluding VAT).
Deposit: 6 months’ rent + common charges (unless otherwise agreed).
Tenant pays for electricity and shared/common expenses.

details.heading: Local Environment
items: Situated in an active pedestrian street known for its foot traffic and local shopping.
Close to popular cafes, restaurants, banks, train station, and city attractions.
Only 100 meters from Sandefjords Blad media house and near public parks.
7 km from Sandefjord Airport Torp.
Sandefjord is a modern city retaining its small-town charm with high-end amenities.

details.heading: Legal & Cadastral Information
items: Cadastral: Municipality no. 706, Farm no. 172, Usage no. 162
Brokers are subject to anti-money laundering laws requiring them to report suspicious activity to Økokrim.

title: Development Site for 50 Apartments in Sandefjord City Center
about: This is a development-ready parking lot located at Kongens gate 11, 3201 Sandefjord. The property is currently appraised at €1,020,000 (kr. 12,000,000) and is intended to be developed into a residential project consisting of approximately 50 apartments, each around 40 m². The estimated total value after full development is approximately €14,450,000 (kr. 170,000,000). Situated in a prime central location, this property offers an excellent opportunity for long-term investment or joint venture development.

details.heading: Development Overview
items: Located at Kongens gate 11, Sandefjord city center.
Currently a parking lot with official appraisal value of kr. 12,000,000.
Approved concept includes ~50 apartments of around 40 m² each.
Projected total property value post-development: kr. 170,000,000.

details.heading: Investment Highlights
items: Rare development plot in Sandefjord’s prime area.
Ideal for investors seeking mid-size residential developments.
Tokenized offering allows for fractional investment in development value.

details.heading: Legal & Property Info
items: Property Type: Development Land
Status: Undeveloped land with current parking use.
Cadastral Information: Not yet provided.
